summary: A psychopath uses a family's high tech security system with a ticking time bomb to terrorize them for 90 minutes demanding an answer to his question; 'WHO AM I?'
cast: David Chisum|Louise Griffiths|Henri Lubatti|Assaf Cohen|Emma Rayne Lyle|Graham Ard|Bernadette Chapman|Carla DeFranco|Kim Rollins Dometrovich|Joshua Garner|Annette Gill|Stephen Gleeson|Randy 'Mongo' Halpern|Regina Harbour|Colleen Laeger|Katie Lee|Victor McCay|Aliya Opengart|Rose Opengart|Zachary Opengart|Stephen Parr|Cory Pennington|Ashley Renfroe|Gregory Taylor|Kurtis Watkins|Brian Webber|Tom Wofford|Anjolie Nieman
title: Llamada oculta
